Package game_code

Class RandomEvent

java.lang.Object
game_code.RandomEvent
public class RandomEvent
extends java.lang.Object
The random events of the game.
Author:
nzoli

    private int combat

    How severe the event is - different based on type

    The ship that the random event is affecting

    The GameStats instance that the game is working with

  • Constructor Details

    • RandomEvent

      public RandomEvent​(Ship ship, GameStats stats)
      Constructor for the class. Randomly determines type with equal chance.
      Parameters:
      ship - The ship that the random event is affecting
      stats - The GmaeStats instance that the game is working with.

  • Method Details

    • determineType

      private void determineType()
      Randomly determines the type of event, with equal chances. Types are Pirate attack, Bad Weather, and Marooned Sailors.

    • setType

      public void setType​(java.lang.String type)
      Setter method for the type. Should only be used in tests, or to force a certain type of event.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of event, which must be in string form and be one of the following: "Pirates!", "A Terrible Storm!", or "Marooned Sailors!"

    • setMagnitude

      public void setMagnitude​(int mag)
      Setter method for magnitude. Should only be used for tests.
      Parameters:
      mag - The magnitude of the event. For pirates a 0 will always let the player win and 10 will always make the player lose For Weather this is the amount of damage the ship takes For Sailors this is how much money they'll give you

    • activateEvent

      public boolean activateEvent()
      Activates the event. Requires no parameters as this method handles everything else from here until the event ends.
      Returns:
      Returns False if the game should continue, and True if pirates have killed the player. So it should be used like if (activateEvent) { GameOver() }

    • rob

      private java.lang.String rob()
      The pirate method for robbing the ship of all its contents.
      Returns:
      Returns a string indicating whether or not the pirates spare the player.

    • getType

      public java.lang.String getType()
      Gets the string-version type of event this is
      Returns:
      The type of event this is, being one of Pirates! A Terrible Storm! Marooned Sailors!

    • getCombat

      public int getCombat()
      Gets the combat roll of the player
      Returns:
      The int version of the combat roll the player got

    • getMagnitude

      public int getMagnitude()
      Gets the magnitude of the event
      Returns:
      The magnitude of the current random event
